meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who is studying at a school or other educational institution.

examples.sentence: The [student] studied hard for the final exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位學生為期末考試努力學習。

examples.sentence: She is an excellent [student] in her class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是班上的優秀學生。

examples.sentence: Every [student] has to complete their assignments on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位學生都必須按時完成作業。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Indicating necessity or obligation.

examples.sentence: You [must] finish your homework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你必須完成你的作業。

examples.sentence: We [must] leave now to catch the train.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們現在必須離開以趕上火車。

examples.sentence: She [must] see this movie.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她必須看這部電影。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A greeting used to begin a conversation.

examples.sentence: [Hello], how are you?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你好，你好嗎？

examples.sentence: She waved and said [hello].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她揮手說了你好

examples.sentence: [Hello], it's nice to see you!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你好，很高興見到你！

meanings.meaning_en_US: To change direction or position.

examples.sentence: Please [turn] left at the next street.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在下一條街左轉。

examples.sentence: She will [turn] the pages of the book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將翻閱這本書的頁面。

examples.sentence: He had to [turn] back because he forgot something.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不得不折回去，因為他忘了拿東西。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A sweet, sticky substance produced by bees from nectar, used as food.

examples.sentence: She added [honey] to her tea.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在茶裡加了蜂蜜。

examples.sentence: The [honey] was harvested from local beehives.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些蜂蜜是從當地的蜂箱採集的。

examples.sentence: He loves [honey] on his toast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡在吐司上抹蜂蜜。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Optical instruments consisting of a frame holding lenses for correcting or protecting the eyes.

examples.sentence: He wears [glasses] to see better.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他戴眼鏡來看得更清楚

examples.sentence: She bought new [glasses] last week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她上週買了新眼鏡

examples.sentence: Remember to clean your [glasses] regularly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 記得定期清潔你的眼鏡

meanings.meaning_en_US: A casual shirt with short sleeves and no collar, typically made of cotton.

examples.sentence: He wore a red [T-shirt] to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他穿了一件紅色的 T 恤參加派對。

examples.sentence: My favorite [T-shirt] has a cool design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我最喜歡的 T 恤有一個酷酷的設計。

examples.sentence: She bought a new [T-shirt] from the store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在商店買了一件新的 T 恤。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The time or a period of time following the moment of speaking or writing.

examples.sentence: We need to think about the [future].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要考慮未來。

examples.sentence: In the [future], technology will be different.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在未來，技術將會有所不同。

examples.sentence: She hopes for a bright [future].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她希望擁有光明的未來。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A feeling of happy satisfaction and enjoyment.

examples.sentence: It was a [pleasure] to meet you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 見到你很愉快。

examples.sentence: Reading is a great source of [pleasure].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 閱讀是一個很好的愉悅來源。

examples.sentence: They find [pleasure] in helping others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在幫助他人中找到快樂。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up to and including the present or the time mentioned; even now.

examples.sentence: She is [still] waiting for a response.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她仍然在等待回覆。

examples.sentence: It is [still] raining outside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 外面仍在下雨。

examples.sentence: He is [still] the best player on the team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他仍然是隊裡最好的球員。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A particular spot, place, or position in an area or on a map.

examples.sentence: He marked the [point] on the map.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在地圖上標記了該點。

examples.sentence: The [point] of interest is nearby.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 感興趣的地方就在附近。

examples.sentence: She arrived at the [point] in her speech.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在演講中達到了要點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day of the week between Tuesday and Thursday.

examples.sentence: Meeting is scheduled for Wednesday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議安排在星期三

examples.sentence: She always feels tired on Wednesdays.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在星期三總是感到疲倦

examples.sentence: I usually go grocery shopping on Wednesday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我通常在星期三去購物

meanings.meaning_en_US: Easily understood or done; presenting no difficulty.

examples.sentence: The instructions are very [simple].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些說明非常簡單。

examples.sentence: She prefers a [simple] design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡簡單的設計。

examples.sentence: His explanations are always [simple] and clear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的解釋總是簡單明瞭。

meanings.meaning_en_US: At a point in space or time in relation to something else.

examples.sentence: He stood [behind] her in line.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在她的身後排隊。

examples.sentence: The sun sets [behind] the mountains.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽在山後落下。

examples.sentence: There's a secret [behind] that door.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那扇門後面有個秘密。

meanings.note: Can refer to both physical and metaphorical positions.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To stumble or fall while walking or running.

examples.sentence: He tried not to [trip] over the uneven pavement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試著不在不平的路面上絆倒

examples.sentence: Be careful not to [trip] on the stairs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 小心不要在樓梯上絆倒

examples.sentence: She will [trip] during the race if she is not careful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果不小心，她在比賽中會絆倒

meanings.meaning_en_US: A journey or excursion, especially for pleasure.

examples.sentence: We planned a weekend [trip] to the mountains.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們計劃週末去山上旅行

examples.sentence: Many people enjoy a [trip] to the beach in summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人喜歡夏天去海灘旅行

examples.sentence: He documented his [trip] across Europe in a blog.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在部落格中記錄了他在歐洲的旅行

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to identify a specific set of items.

examples.sentence: [These] are my favorite books.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些是我最喜歡的書。

examples.sentence: I want to buy [these] shoes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想買這些鞋子。

examples.sentence: Have you seen [these] pictures?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你有看過這些照片嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A day or period of celebration, typically for religious reasons.

examples.sentence: The music [festival] attracted many visitors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 音樂節吸引了許多遊客

examples.sentence: They celebrated the harvest [festival] every year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們每年慶祝收穫節

examples.sentence: The city holds a [festival] in the summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座城市在夏天舉辦節慶

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having achieved wealth, respect, or fame.

examples.sentence: She is a [successful] entrepreneur.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位成功的企業家。

examples.sentence: His [successful] career spans over two decades.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的成功職業生涯跨越了二十多年。

examples.sentence: What makes a person truly [successful]?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 什麼讓一個人真正成功？

meanings.meaning_en_US: To allow or permit.

examples.sentence: Please [let] me know if you need help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你需要幫助，請告訴我。

examples.sentence: Don't [let] the opportunity pass you by.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要讓機會從你身邊溜走。

examples.sentence: I [let] him borrow my book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我讓他借了我的書。
